Title: Memoirs of a Geisha
Author: Arthur Golden
Description: The novel told in first person perspective tells the story of a fictional geisha working in Kyoto Japan before during and after World War II and ends with her being relocated to New York City.

Title: Circe
Author: Madeline Miller
Description: In the house of Helios god of the sun and mightiest of the Titans a daughter is born.

Title: Fairy Oak
Author: Elisabetta Gnone
Description: In an ancient magical village which is hidden in the depths of a timeless past.

Title: The hating game
Author: Sally Thorne
Description: Lucy Hutton has always been certain that the nice girl can get the corner office.

Title: The glass hotel
Author: Emily St. John Mandel
Description: Vincent is a bartender at the Hotel Caiette a five-star lodging on the northernmost tip of Vancouver Island.
